doc.title: Mother Knows Best
doc.plot: In this one-off celebration of motherhood, presenter 'Ulrika Jonsson' (qv), gives four women a chance to test the old adage! The four women in question meddle in their children's lives to a greater or lesser extent. One mother has taken charge of her son's love life as she believes he is hopeless at choosing girlfriends whilst another advises her daughter on wedding outfits believing the costumes from "Star Trek" to be completely unsuitable!!
